response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly worth more than $150 to anyone who appreciates its value. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive opportunity to you. For a limited time, I am offering this product to you at an introductory price of $180. This special offer is designed to reward early adopters and ensure you receive the best possible experience with our product. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly remarkable at a fantastic deal. Let me know if you're interested, and we can proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 180}
